alert.note: Alert for Northumberland; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:57PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN SCHUYLKILL AND SOUTHEASTERN NORTHUMBERLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM EDT... At 757 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shamokin, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Pottsville, Minersville, Pine Grove, Tremont, Tower City, Marlin, Forrestville, Branchdale, Seltzer, Donaldson, Heckscherville, Buck Run, Beurys Lake, Hegins, Ravine, Muir, Orwin, Newtown, Pitman and Schuykill County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central Pennsylvania.
